abstract: Microsoft has a new version of Windows coming that’s meant to capitalize on the “cloud computing” buzz.
snippet: Microsoft has a new version of Windows coming that’s meant to capitalize on the “cloud computing” buzz.
lead_paragraph: Steve Ballmer, Microsoft’s chief executive, has hit the European press circuit in full-on tease mode. He’s talking up a new version of the Windows operating system that will cater to so-called cloud computing technology, where people use software running in a data center rather than on their local machine.

headline.main: Microsoft Promises New, Fluffier Version of Windows
